timeline.bodyText: Was there a reason a Set was used here before? Could it be to avoid duplicates?
timeline.author: lahirumaramba

replies.bodyText:
I think that's the idea, but it's redundant. App names are unique by definition. When adding a new app we check this:
checkState(
          !instances.containsKey(normalizedName),
          "FirebaseApp name " + normalizedName + " already exists!");

This actually gives me an idea. We can use the instances.keySet() to populate the List. I'll make the change.
replies.author: hiranya911

timeline.message: Using the keySet of App instances to populate the app names list
